mapper.insert:
insert into car_driver_day_duty (driver_id,driver_name, city_id,city_name,supplier_id,supplier_name,team_id,team_name, time,forced_ids,duty_ids, forced_times,duty_times,type,status) values
(#{item.driverId},#{item.driverName},#{item.cityId},#{item.cityName}, #{item.supplierId},#{item.supplierName},#{item.teamId}, #{item.teamName},#{item.time},#{item.forcedIds},#{item.dutyIds}, #{item.forcedTimes},#{item.dutyTimes},#{item.type},#{item.status})
mapper.sql: d.id, d.driver_id, d.driver_name, d.city_id, d.city_name, d.supplier_id, d.supplier_name, d.team_id, d.team_name, d.time, d.forced_ids, d.duty_ids, d.forced_times, d.duty_times, d.type, d.status
